io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.chunk

Class ChunkWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.chunk.ChunkWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    World
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABTNetWorld, ABTWorld, WorldFromImage

    public class ChunkWorld
extends java.lang.Object
implements World
    A class for storing world data using many chunks.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
    See Also:
    Chunk
